string.text: Loki has ordered a sweep of the local area to eliminate any zombified stalkers.
We're conducting another sweep of the area to cut down the growing numbers of zombified stalkers. I'm happy to pay you if you want to join in.
A Freedom scouting patrol has spotted a group of %s preparing a raid on a Freedom camp. Meet up with the scouts and lead the attack against the enemy.
Search and destroy any %s in the area.
Report back to {npc_name} on the success of the attack.

We need your help. Our scouts have spotted a gathering of %s and are concerned they are preparing to mount an assault against one of our camps. I want us to get them before they get us. Head over there to reinforce the scouts and lead them in the attack.
Good, Loki sent %s to help us. Let's move out.
You have done well to help us. We need all the help we can get up here. Please, take this as a reward.
There is %s known as %s that has been indiscriminately murdering stalkers in the area around Yanov Station. Find out where he is hiding and put an end to the bloodshed.
There's a killer on the loose that has been plaguing this area. It's hard enough to survive up here without having a psychopath running around. Help us track him down and bring him to justice.
Thank you stalker. You have saved countless lives by putting an end to the slaughter.
A band of %s have captured a Freedomer. Kill the guards and extract the prisoner.
Yes, help us out! One of my men was captured and taken prisoner by some %s. Head over there and break him out!
You have done well. Thank you for freeing our comrade.
